roleset.name: to touch in such a way as to induce laughter and/or crying
roleset.note: TICKLE-V NOTES: Frame file for "tickle" loosely based on frame for "paw". includes metaphorical usages. Member of Vncls amuse-31.1, touch-20-1, tingle-40.8.2. VN, FN udated by Julia, 10/2010. (from tickle.01-v)
TICKLING-N NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to tickle.01. Tickle.01 is a member of VN classes amuse-31.1, tingle-40.8.2, and touch-20-1. Framed by Katie. (from tickling.01-n)

example.name: without instrument
example.text: Greg tickled Marsha for a whole episode of the Brady Bunch.
example.arg: for a whole episode of the Brady Bunch

example.name: with instrument
example.text: The kitten tickled Norm's face with its whiskers.

example.name: when in doubt between arg 0 and and 2, use arg 0
example.text: The cough's tickling of his throat
